Mitigation.Textual:
The following configurable elements are not compliant:
{add}
{remove}
{notes}

Use TLS Compression_config.Apache: Use TLS Compression: search for the SSLCompression directive and set it to off.

Client-initiated renegotiation_config.Apache: Client-initiated renegotiation: search for the SSLInsecureRenegotiation directive and set it to off.

< 0.9.8m.Textual: OpenSSL versions previous to 0.9.8m allows client insecure renegotiation.
